title: Evaluating Large Language Models for Quality Control in Research Ethics Review
details: P Maghsoudlou, J Fennely-Barnwell, A Abraham… - 2025
abstract: Abstract Large Language Models (LLMs) could streamline research ethics and governance review by automating routine quality control checks. This study assessed Claude 3.5 Sonnet, ChatGPT4o, and Microsoft CoPilot in evaluating …
